CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Nuclear?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Nuclear is arc {Hydropower}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Biomass?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Biomass is arc {Hydropower}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Nuclear to Hydropower in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Nuclear to Biomass in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Hydropower to Nuclear in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Hydropower and Biomass in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Hydropower and Biomass is {273}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Biomass and Hydropower in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Biomass and Hydropower is {113}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Biomass?
SC.A: The total flow output from Biomass is {156}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Hydropower?
SC.A: The total flow input by Hydropower is {131}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 280? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {288} from {Hydropower} to {Nuclear}, a flow of {388} from {Nuclear} to {Biomass}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 30? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {18} from {Nuclear} to {Hydropower}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 30 and 280? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {43} from {Biomass} to {Nuclear}, a flow of {113} from {Biomass} to {Hydropower}, a flow of {273} from {Hydropower} to {Biomass}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Biomass to Nuclear or from Hydropower to Biomass?
NC.A: The flow from {Hydropower} to {Biomass} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Nuclear to Hydropower, from Hydropower to Nuclear, or from Nuclear to Biomass?
NC.A: The flow from {Nuclear} to {Biomass} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Hydropower}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Biomass} and {Nuclear}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Hydropower, Arc Biomass, Arc Nuclear}.
